name: VIDEO: New Mural Supports Commitment to Neurodiversity
description: A new mural at the County’s Waterfront Park is more than just a beautiful work of art – it represents the County’s commitment to neurodiversity and inclusivity in our workforce.

affiliation.name: County of San Diego Communications Office

articleContent:
A new mural at the County’s Waterfront Park is more than just a beautiful work of art – it represents the County’s commitment to neurodiversity and inclusivity in our workforce. Neurodiversity recognizes the variation in neurocognitive functioning within the human population and emphasizes the opportunities that come from embracing differences.
The County’s Human Resources Department has been working with local partners to increase recruitment and outreach in the neurodivergent community, and the new mural uses artistic expression to raise awareness. County employees and their families supported the entire process – from design input to painting. See how the mural came to life, and learn more about the County’s job opportunities.
